entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
